text: Alfred J. Freddoso (born 1946) is an American philosopher and Professor Emeritus of Philosophy and John and Jean Oesterle Professor Emeritus of Thomistic Studies at the University of Notre Dame. He is the father of David Freddoso. ==See also== *American philosophy *List of American philosophers ==References== Category:University of Notre Dame faculty Category:Living people Category:American philosophers Category:University of Notre Dame alumni Category:Moral philosophers Category:Metaphysicians Category:1946 births
title: Alfred J. Freddoso
